   <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="MTR-1928-86-15-SECTION-1-01.pdf_page_1.png" width="2992" height="4412" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="height width url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="246,291 252,1111 2839,1111 2839,288" id="eSc_textblock_f260a47f" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="252,1155 252,4109 2817,4109 2817,1155" id="eSc_textblock_902d71e6" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2822,2941 2822,2968 2805,2958 2815,2941" id="eSc_textblock_e59068aa" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f260a47f" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-gap reason="irrelevant" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="reason" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_902d71e6" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>An Important Message
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>For Dealers Who Desire A Reproducing Piano for a Leader
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE-MIGNON</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Is the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Original
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>REPRODUCING PIANO</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>And Was the First Ever Sold in the World

            <tei-cb data-origname="cb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">The Original Welte-Mignon Reproduc-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing Piano</tei-name> as manufactured by the new
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Welte-Mignon Corp.</tei-orgName> is the finest product
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of its kind in the world.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The new <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Welte-Mignon Corp.</tei-orgName> is not only
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>strongly entreched financially, but has a
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>very able staff of executives of proven ability,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>who are pursuing a policy of producing only
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the highest quality instruments - Grand
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Pianos under the name of <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">"Welte"</tei-name>,
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">"Welte-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon"</tei-name> Reproducing Pianos and Organs,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>grands of various sizes in conventional and
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>period designs. The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE-MIGNON</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>franchise is a valuable one for the leader.

            <tei-cb data-origname="cb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">The Original Welte-Mignon</tei-name> as manufac-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tured by the new <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Welte-Mignon Corp.</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>not only retains all the marvelous features
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>invented by <tei-persName data-origname="persName">Edwin Welte</tei-persName>, but also has many
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>refinements in manufacture which places it
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>in its rightful position as THE reproducing
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>piano. We invite comparison.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">The Original Welte-Mignon</tei-name> is found in grands
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>which in every way meet the requirements
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the most representative music merchants.

            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon Library</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>1st Most Comprehensive. It Comprises Several Thousand Recordings That Reproduce
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#analogy_to_photography" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                With Photographic Accuracy
            </tei-seg> the Individual Playing of
            the Master Pianists of the World<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#immortality" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                "The Instrument That Immortalizes the Playing of the Masters"
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">THE ORIGINAL WELTE-MIGNON</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>A Leader for Every Representative Music Merchant
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Let Us Tell You More About Our Proposition
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">THE WELTE-MIGNON CORP.</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
                665 FIFTH AVENUE
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>NEW YORK, N. Y
            </tei-address>.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e59068aa" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
